Question: The juror was quite bored and zoning out but wanted to convey he was hearing testimony, so he just sat there doing what?
Options: A. take notes B. nodding C. change of heart D. writing down E. listening

The juror was bored and zoning out but wanted to convey he was hearing testimony, so he just sat there doing nodding. Nodding can be done to convey that one is listening attentively. All other options are not related to conveying that one is listening attentively. Hence, the final answer is: B. nodding.

通过对问题的分析，该问题的答案应为“E. listening”（倾听）。根据上下文描述，该陪审员虽然感到无聊并走神，但他想要传达自己正在听取证词，所以他只是在那里坐着做“倾听”。因此，选项E“倾听”最符合上下文描述。其他选项与上下文描述不符。
